showerReviews.reviewText: Dunkin coffee wasn‚Äôt good. Women‚Äôs restroom was closed. Had to use a shower. Manager was nice and gave us the coffee. Pizza was better than most Pilot pizza, but still wasn‚Äôt fresh.

Look at some of the pictures posted. Do you see how big their showers are? Very clean, more like a bathroom suite than a truck stop shower!  They are fairly new (2yrs). The coffee is good and they sell fresh donuts that are soo good. I ‚Ä¶
Very clean showers, Dunkin donut station AND delicious biscuit breakfast sandwiches!! I had never used a truck stop shower before but they were extremely helpful and accommodating!!

They weren't very busy when I got there so I was able to grab a shower right away, I noticed they only had 3 showers so don't come here looking to shower quick when they're busy. The whole place was well maintained including my shower all ‚Ä¶

Clean location, shower clean and spacious, and I've definitely seen worse truck parking lol, all around good place to stop

Extremely clean inside, in every part (main store, in the Iron Skillet and Starbucks, the bathroom and the shower I used). Friendly staff all around. Good selection of items you may need while traveling. The shower had nice, hot water. Only ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA exudes a clean, vibrant New Mexico vibe. The colorful exterior leads to an interior filled with amazing art and a great selection for travelers and truckers. Dining options are adequate, and parking is spacious. Service is pleasant, ‚Ä¶

Really small squeegees to clean the windshield.
They still have paid parking here
It's right on the Texas, New Mexico border on interstate 40 ‚Ä¶

This was an incredible stop on our road trip! They truly have everything, a gas station, restaurant, convenience store, laundry facilities, and even a free car museum. It‚Äôs the ultimate one stop shop! The place was clean, the customer service was excellent, and overall, it was one of the best stops we‚Äôve experienced.

showerReviews.reviewerName: Full time explorer RV living (Living on the road!)
showerReviews.reviewText: The free car museum was a nice surprise, friendly staff lots of options for food, snacks, and drinks. However, the bathroom bathrooms are pretty gross and out of toilet paper..  One toilet was leaking on the floor. I did inform the staff when checking out.
showerReviews.uniqueId: Full time explorer RV living (Living on the road!)_The_free_car_museum_was_a_nice_surprise,_friendly__3 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: The best TA I‚Äôve ever seen! It has everything you need, but what really surprised me was the atmosphere ‚Äî it feels like stepping into a movie. There‚Äôs a free museum inside and a great caf√© with delicious food. Very cozy, clean, and unique. I highly recommend stopping by, even if you weren‚Äôt planning to ‚Äî this place is truly worth it!

This place has everything a traveler needs. Showers that are squeaky clean with a sink toilet and shower in each room, a diner with really good Mexican and American food, a market for groceries, and wait for it... even a car musuem. And the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Fifth - THE SHOWERS.  As a woman, I really appreciate showers that are actually CLEAN.  And not a man‚Äôs version of clean. üòÇüôà When the tile grout is clean and the drains aren‚Äôt gunky, the vents aren‚Äôt caked in dust and the toilet bowl ( ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ your legs TONS of route66 souvenirs Millions of dollars worth of priceless antique cars and trucks and motorcycles and MANY MANY other artifacts and collectibles in their walk thru museum and really big clean bathrooms with shower too

Cool little place to stop and grab a bite to eat. They have lots of trucker necessities and for $12 you can have a hot shower with a clean towel. They have lots of unique nick nacks and lots of cool different food items for your hangrey ‚Ä¶
I love this truck stop! It has all kinds of eats and drinks,clean bathrooms. Truckers shower, subway, nice friendly staff and a free yes I said free car museum!
Love the museum. Took a shower here . Was great as well . Plenty of parking .
Shower was nice but pumps were down for my hour visit. I was very low on def but had to press on.

Wonderful Hot shower with a rain shower head. And fantastic soft water..I‚Äôve been out west for awhile and it‚Äôs been like trying to get suds from a stone everywhere I shower! $12 shower/$5 deposit for a plush towel. So clean too, I even ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I came back in the next morning, after sleeping, to get a shower and there was nothing on my rewards card. When I gave Diane all my info she still couldn't find my payment and started getting rude by telling me "I don't know what to tell ‚Ä¶

Lots of parking for semi truck, showers were wonderful, huge shower room with great big fluffy towels, everyone that works there is super friendly and helpful , tire shop was great too, we had to get 2 trailer tires replaced and they were ‚Ä¶

Plenty of parking. Free shower with fuel purchase of 60 ga. Ample parking at all hours. This location is more like a grocery store with fuel service. It's not bad. Check em out.

Bathrooms and showers are in need of some TLC. The sink in shower 2 is completely broken. 2 out of the 4 stalls in the womens restroom are broken. Gas is cheap though and the groceries are very cheap too. They sell liquor.
